CIRCULAR NO : 15/2013
Subject:
Corrigendum regarding AEP
In terms of Rule 18 of the Aircraft (Security) Rules-2011 the appendix
‘J’ of AVSEC circular No. 02/2007 dated 14.02.2007 is replaced with the appendix
attached to this circular for implementation of biometric based access control
system.
(R N Dhoke, IPS)
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA)
Enclosures : Appendix ‘J’ alongwith annexure ‘A’, ‘B’, and ‘C’.
Distribution - As per list attached.
Copy to :-
MCA (Shri U K Bhatia, U/Secretary), R G Bhawan, New Delhi.
